meanings.sent1: I need some dosh to buy a new toy.
meanings.sent2: She always carries her dosh in a wallet.
meanings.sent3: The dosh in my piggy bank is growing fast!
meanings.sent4: His dosh seemed to disappear into thin air.
meanings.sent5: The dosh jingled in his pocket as he walked.

meanings.sent1: He paid for the tickets with dosh.
meanings.sent2: The dosh in the register needed to be counted.
meanings.sent3: I found some dosh hidden in my jacket pocket!
meanings.sent4: Her dosh was like a magic key that opened doors.
meanings.sent5: The dosh exchanged hands quickly at the market.

meanings.sent1: His dosh came from years of hard work.
meanings.sent2: The dosh in their family was passed down for generations.
meanings.sent3: She flaunted her dosh by buying extravagant gifts.
meanings.sent4: In his eyes, knowledge was more valuable than dosh.
meanings.sent5: The dosh of kindness can never be depleted.
